automation.headline: Autonomous supply chain network mission control is online
automation.missionSummary: The sovereign AGI supply chain network proved it can be paused, tuned, disputed, and relaunched instantly — even non-technical owners command it through scripted drills and a live control room.

ownerDirectives.title: Lock CI v2 branch protection
ownerDirectives.summary: Run the branch protection verifier so every pull request is blocked unless the CI summary gate and its upstream jobs succeed.

metrics.requiredContexts: Lint & static checks · Tests · Foundry · Coverage thresholds · CI summary

ownerDirectives.title: Replay sovereign mission control drill
ownerDirectives.summary: Re-run the Hardhat automation to reconfirm fee, burn, quorum, and pause powers any time parameters change or new validators onboard.

ownerDirectives.title: Refresh owner telemetry dashboard
ownerDirectives.summary: Publish the owner dashboard so stakeholders see the same unstoppable controls showcased in this run.

ownerDirectives.title: Review quadratic voting treasury controls
ownerDirectives.summary: Inspect the quadratic voting ledger, confirm the delegated executor, and stage new appropriations for regional missions.

agentOpportunities.title: Credential #1 in circulation
agentOpportunities.summary: Aurora Logistics AI (AI Agent) can reuse this credential to unlock premium sovereign mandates and accelerated onboarding.

agentOpportunities.title: Credential #2 in circulation
agentOpportunities.summary: Zephyr Relief Swarm (AI Agent) can reuse this credential to unlock premium sovereign mandates and accelerated onboarding.

validatorSignals.title: Enforce non-reveal discipline
validatorSignals.summary: Validators that skip reveals are automatically slashed and banned; keep the penalty active before onboarding larger councils.

validatorSignals.title: Review validator reputation and liquidity
validatorSignals.summary: Monitor validator liquidity and locked stake to keep dispute resolution credible and unstoppable.

treasuryAlerts.title: Reconfirm sovereign treasury routing
treasuryAlerts.summary: Audit stake and fee treasuries after every drill so allied recipients remain allowlisted and emergency revocations stay one command away.

treasuryAlerts.title: Distribute pending protocol fees
treasuryAlerts.summary: Route pending fees to the treasury and validator pool so burn accounting and validator incentives stay perfectly balanced.

treasuryAlerts.title: Safeguard stake depth
treasuryAlerts.summary: Keep agent and validator capital above the baseline so the unstoppable supply chain network retains immediate settlement capacity.
